EmailTemplate.name: 201808_WebinarInvite_RDR4000_LG.201808_WebinarInvite_RDR4000_Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Free Technical Webinar: Reduce No-Fault-Founds on Your IntuVue Weather Radar System
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> TECH TIPS WEBINAR:
Reduce No-Fault-Found Part Removals on your IntuVue Weather Radar System Please join us... Two Options: 21 August: 11am-12pm EDT <https://honeywell-it.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_nswRBDYWT6C5D0YwrnKBKg> (UTC -4) <https://honeywell-it.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_nswRBDYWT6C5D0YwrnKBKg>
22 August: 9pm-10pm EDT <https://honeywell-it.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_HgQCJX3BSUmFc0bLtdeEJg> (UTC -4) <https://honeywell-it.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_HgQCJX3BSUmFc0bLtdeEJg>
Location Please click the appropriate link above to register.
Our goal is to keep you flying with fewer system removals and less strain on your spares inventory. Honeywell’s IntuVueTM RDR-4000 Weather Radar System provides system maintenance information to help you review fault codes and identify corrective actions.
Join Honeywell experts Bob Miller and Rosemary Susai to review commonly-seen system fault codes to ensure the correct system component is removed on the first attempt and reduce your no-fault found on Airbus A319, A320, A321, A330 and A340 aircraft.
Register by selecting one of the two available sessions.
Questions will be answered.
Honeywell Aerospace Customer & Product Support Visit MyAerospace <[[http://www.myaerospace.honeywell.com]]>
